title: Part 1 - DEBT COLLECTION BY THIRD-PARTY DEBT COLLECTORS AND DEBT BUYERS
content:

State Regulations
§ 1.1 - Definitions
§ 1.2 - Required initial disclosures by debt collectors
§ 1.3 - Disclosures for debts in which the statute of limitations may be expired
§ 1.4 - Substantiation of consumer debts

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
